ThingDef.label: wolfsbane elixir
ThingDef.description:
An elixir made from wolfsbane petals, the effect it has on the ingestors body depends on the advancement, or lack, of lycanthropy.

When ingested by those without any traces of lycanthropy, it provides short-term resistance, helping to prevent them against being infected with Sanies Lupinus.

When ingested by those that are currently infected by Sanies Lupinus, it temporarily weakens the infection, reducing the severity of it. It is not able to cure Sanies Lupinus outright.

When ingested by those with dormant lycanthropy, it is able to prevent a forced transformation, as long as it is still active in the blood.

When ingested by a lycanthrope, it causes immense nausea, and has a chance of curing the ingestor of lycanthropy.

HediffDef.label: wolfsbane resistance
HediffDef.description: A wolfsbane elixir active in ones bloodstream. Helps to provide resistance against infection by Sanies Lupinus.

HediffDef.label: wolfsbane prevention
HediffDef.description: A wolfsbane elixir active in ones bloodstream. Prevents forced transformation when a Hunstman's Moon rises.

HediffDef.label: wolfsbane nausea
HediffDef.description: A wolfsbane elixir active in ones bloodstream. Causes severe nausea.
